name: Isle of Swaps
description:
The hottest new craze Critter Cards have released! Following the release of the anime and video game, everyone in the playground is collecting and swapping their Critter Cards to fill up their collections.

Talk to your friends, swap cards and battle with them. Winning battles earns you money you can put into the Booster Machine for a random selection of 5 cards. Can you complete the collection?

WASD/Arrows to move. Mouse to use menus.

Sorry if the text is a bit small in places and there's no sounds. It's just a prototype so let me know what you think of this idea. Do you want to see more? Let me know in the comments
